title: Did a Catholic school in California remove a religious State from her campus?
subtitle: The conservative website accurately stated that the San Domenico School removed some statues; however, it overestimated the extent to which the statues were removed and ignored the critical context.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2017, San Domingo School in San Anselmo, California, removed some Catholic statues from its campus in an effort to be more inclusive.
